topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Agile development tools

name: BamBam! Project Management Tool
short_description:
It simply makes your work easier. It offers a packet of innovative tools that allow people of different work styles and roles to find a joint platform for common cooperation. And it’s free for teams up to 10 users. 

Freelancers, small businesses as well as big companies find the offered solutions really useful. It’s for those who want to increase the level of productivity without increasing the level of stress and pressure. 

Thanks to its clever solutions BamBam! solves the major problems of project management. It minimalizes the risk of losing messages, helps filter information and improves its flow. It contains one work frame for different users. 

People who need to deal with different types of tasks and/or are responsible for different kinds of projects can concentrate only on their own work. If necessary though they can get permission to access the projects or tasks managed by other users.
summary: BamBam! Project Management Tool for Pros
